/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of the city's towering structures. The buildings, tall and modern, are painted in shades of gray and white, reflecting the urban landscape of the city. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds, adding a touch of serenity to the otherwise busy scene. The street itself is lined with lush green trees and bushes, providing a stark contrast to the concrete jungle. Cars and buses can be seen in motion, adding a dynamic element to the scene. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow on the buildings and creating a lens flare in the top left corner of the image.
